root.name: Evolution Worlds
root.description: Evolution Worlds is a re-release of the Dreamcast RPGs Evolution: The World of Sacred Device, and Evolution 2: Far Off Promise.While Evolution 2 appears in it's entirety, Evolution's story is cut down, reducing the number of dunegons and focusing mainly on the storyline.Â Evolution Worlds takes place in the year 930, and puts the player in the control of young adventurer, Mag Launcher. Mag is a Cyframe User, a person who's given weapon like equipment by the Society and tasked to explore ruins.
